main.templatetags package¶

Submodules¶

main.templatetags.main_extras module¶

main.templatetags.main_extras.addclass(value, arg)¶

This function adds a CSS class to a given HTML tag.

Parameters

  • value (class 'django.forms.boundfield.BoundField') – a tag in which a CSS class will be added

  • arg (str) – CSS class name

main.templatetags.main_extras.current_time(format_string)¶

This function returns the current server time in a given string format.

Parameters

format_string (str) – a string that provides how-to format time

main.templatetags.main_extras.dyslexia(value)¶

This function swaps two random chars in all words of a given string.

Parameters

value (str) – input string

main.templatetags.main_extras.revert(value)¶

This function reverts a given string.

Parameters

value (str) – a string which will be reverted

main.templatetags.main_extras.swap_chars(word: str, first_char: int, second_char: int)¶

This function swaps ‘first_char’ and ‘second_char’ in a given ‘word’.

Parameters

  • word (str) – a word where chars will be swapped

  • first_char (int) – position of a first char

  • second_char (int) – position of a second char
